2412.TW.summary: Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd. provides telecommunication services in Taiwan. It operates through Domestic Fixed Communications Business, Mobile Communications Business, Internet Business, International Fixed Communications Business, and Others segments. The company offers local and domestic long distance telephone and leased line, broadband access, Wi-Fi, and multimedia on demand services; information and communication technology (ICT) services; and interconnection with its fixed-line network to other mobile and fixed-line operators. It also provides mobile; HiNet Internet, data communication, and cloud; application value-added and Internet data center; international long distance telephone, leased line, and data; and satellite services. In addition, the company distributes and sells mobile handsets, tablets, wearable devices, data cards, electronic materials, ICT products, and computing and business machinery equipment and software; designs, develops, produces, sells, and services semiconductor testing components, printed circuit boards, and electronic components and finished products, and automatic license plate recognition software and hardware products. Further, it offers property development and management; system, network, and communications integration; intelligent buildings and energy network; digital information supply and advertisement; property and liability insurance agency; family education; computing equipment installation; management consultancy; data processing; telecommunications engineering; Internet identify; and information and communication solution services. Additionally, the company engages in the investment; software design services, and internet contents production and play; motion picture production and distribution; and provision of energy saving solutions and international circuits, and services for electronic parts and machinery processed products. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3064.TWO.summary: Astro Corporation develops, produces, and operates digital games, systems, and software and hardware for gaming and lottery products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers various self-service betting halls, monitor centers, and lottery games; casino and multi player games; cabinets; and lottery, VLT, and casino management systems. It also provides digital entertainment and casual software machine rental and point of sales customization, as well as product outsourcing services. The company is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3083.TWO.summary: Chinese Gamer International Corporation operates as an online game research and development company in Taiwan. It provides mobile and online game services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3085.TWO.summary: Newretail Co., Ltd operates as an Internet company in Taiwan. The company offers foreign trade e-commerce services; virtual hosting, and other basic services; and search engine and digital marketing services, as well as electronic information supply services to foreign trade manufacturers. It engages in the production and installation of computer web pages, web search optimization login, keyword marketing, and computer advertising design and agency services; and clothes business. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3086.TWO.long_name: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
3086.TWO.summary: Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, designs and sells computer software and hardware. It also engages in trading activities; and provision of game software and information software programming services. The company was formerly known as Wayi International Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in June 2000. Wayi International Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3546.TWO.summary: USERJOY Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and sells online and mobile games software in Taiwan and internationally. It offers PC, massively multiplayer online, web, home console, AR/VR, and other games. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3629.TWO.summary: Gravitytai Co.,Ltd. manufactures and distributes indium tin oxide (ITO) conductive films. Its products are used in the manufacture of touch panels of mobile phones, personal digital assistants, and other consumer electronic products, as well as navigation systems, laptops, keyboards, and other areas. The company distributes its products in Taiwan, Mainland China, South Korea, and Japan. Gravitytai Co.,Ltd. is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3687.TWO.long_name: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd.
3687.TWO.summary: MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides online games and community space. The company was formerly known as Macrowell Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. in August 2009. MacroWell OMG Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4803.TWO.summary: VHQ Media Holdings Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the multimedia innovation and creativity, post production, visual effects, and related services for TV advertising, TV drama, online drama, movies, and animation in Taiwan and internationally. The company operates in four segment: Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, and Beijing. It is involved in the content development and performance optimization business; provision of post production services for commercials and feature films; and multimedia shooting and planning for dramas and movies. VHQ Media Holdings Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4806.TWO.summary: ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. engages in the television program production and screenwriting, film production and distribution, and art performing activities in Taiwan and China. It also provides drama series, as well as engages in the literary and artistic creation, corporate image planning, actor brokerage, and graphic system businesses. In addition, it is involved in the investment consulting, business management consulting, and business information consulting activities. The company was formerly known as Shenghua Entertainment Production Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. in June 2012. ShengHua Entertainment Communication co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

4904.TW.summary: Far EasTone Telecommunications Co., Ltd. provides wireless communications, leased circuit, Internet, and international simple resale services in the People's Republic of China. It operates through Mobile Service Business, Fixed-Line Services Business, and Sales Business segments. The Mobile Service Business segment offers mobile telecommunications services. The Fixed-line Service Business segment provides international direct dial, local network, long-distance network, and broadband access services. The Sales Business segment sells cellular phones, computers, and accessories. The company also provides electronic information services; call center services; security and monitoring services through Internet; and computer software, data processing, and network information services. In addition, it is involved in the design and research, install, and maintenance of computer software and systems; and investment activities. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4946.TWO.summary: Cayenne Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd. provides various casual gaming services to online entertainment community in Taiwan. It also provides information software, data processing, and advertising services. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5278.TWO.summary: Sunfun Info Co., Ltd. operates online dating and social networking services in Taiwan, the United States, Mexico, India, and the Southeast Asia. The company offers iPair, weTouch, and SweetRing websites that are dating applications; information software services; and other online platform services. It also engages in the biotechnology and healthcare business. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

5287.TWO.summary: ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd operates online trading platforms in Taiwan and internationally. It operates 8591.com.tw, which offers a virtual treasure trading platform; 591.com.tw and 591.com.hk, a real estate information network platforms; 8891.com.tw, a second-hand car trading platform; and 518.com.tw, a job search and recruitment platform. The company also operates 100.com.tw that offers design case pictures of interior design companies; marry.com.tw, a wedding service platform for wedding-related services, such as wedding photography, records, and bride secretaries; chickpt.com.tw, a part-time job finding APP; and tasker.com.tw for home task function that includes water, electricity, maintenance, and cleaning activities. ADDCN Technology Co., Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6111.TWO.summary: Softstar Entertainment Inc. develops, licenses, and sells mobile, online, and single player games in Mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, and internationally. It also produces and sells peripherals and guides of computer software; and researches and develops network technologies. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6136.TW.summary: Fullerton Technology Co., Ltd. provides activity management services; and operates an online booking service platform in Taiwan. It also operates an Ez Booking, a cross-cinema ticket booking platform that offers movie booking and online e-ticketing services; and Niceday Play Experience, a reservation platform for a few hours of activity experience, or a small day trip. In addition, the company provides a digital imaging service platform; and prepaid card communication services, as well as operates telecom communications exchange platform. Further, it engages in combining software and hardware applications to create a convenient and smart life. Fullerton Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6144.TWO.summary: Deltamac(Taiwan) Co.,Ltd. produces, distributes, and franchises audio and video products in Taiwan. The company engages in production, recording, publication, rental, distribution, and export/import of TV and film program DVD, BD and 4K UHD discs, and music CDs. It is also involved in the agency and sale of physical and digital copyrights of movies; operation of TSUTAYA bookstores and Wired Tokyo cafÃ©s; and provision of catering services. In addition, the company sells stationery products and delicatessen. Deltamac(Taiwan) Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6163.TWO.summary: Hwacom Systems Inc., a broadband system integrator, supplies mobile, fixed, and IP networks related services in Taiwan and internationally. The company also supplies multimedia applications. Its product portfolio includes interactive personalized television (IPTV) set-top boxes, OTT set-top boxes, hybrid set-top boxes, and video gateways, as well as video streaming related consulting and integration services. It also provides broadband infrastructure solutions, value added services, customized network management systems, and integrated video solutions; cloud computing and data center solutions; and IPTV solutions. In addition, the company offers smart city solutions comprising video and traffic surveillance systems; intelligent transportation services; information security management services; multi-channel acquiring and network management solutions; and 3D radar reimage solution. It serves payTV operators, telecoms, and MSOs. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6169.TWO.summary: InterServ International Inc. develops games worldwide. The company is involved in edutainment related activities; and the research, development, and operation of TV/PC/online/Web/mobile games. It also develops PC MMORPG, casual games, console games, and mobile games, as well as app, online, social, PC console, and Xbox360 games. InterServ International Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6170.TWO.summary: Welldone Company engages in telecommunication, mobile game publishing, and digital entertainment businesses primarily in Taiwan. It sells prepaid SIM cards and telecommunication value-added services. The company also represents and conducts various online and Web games through its itsfun.com.tw platform. In addition, it provides QUICKPAY, an online cash-flow service mobile phone micro payment platform; I-MONEY, a universal card for cash flow platform; and game point card services. Further, the company acts as an agent for consumer batteries. Welldone Company was founded in 1977 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6180.TWO.summary: Gamania Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, publishes online and mobile games in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Japan, and Korea. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6184.TW.summary: Dafeng TV Ltd. provides digital cable TV services. It also offers CATV cable services. The company was formerly known as Dah Fung CATV Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Dafeng TV Ltd. in December 2009. Dafeng TV Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6240.TWO.summary: Sung Gang Corp.Limited engages in the information software wholesale in Taiwan. The company is also involved in the book publishing; real estate leasing; sale of electronic parts and computer peripherals; parking lot operations; financial debt purchase; and purchase of financial institutions. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6428.TWO.summary: Taiwan Taomee Co., Ltd. provides online gaming services in Taiwan. Taiwan Taomee Co., Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6464.TW.summary: Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. operates as a multiple system operator of cable television in Taiwan. It offers cable TV-related services, including broadcasting, installation, advertisements, channel leasing, paid channels, etc. The company also provides telecommunication services, such as broadband Internet, urban networks, and circuit leasing. In addition, it operates television channels; and produces and broadcasts local news and public forum programs. The company was formerly known as Bao Yue Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. in January 2013. Taiwan Optical Platform Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Taichung City, Taiwan.

6468.TWO.summary: Netmarble Joybomb Inc. develops and publishes mobile, PC, and console games in Taiwan, Hong Kong, and Macau. The company was formerly known as JoyBomb Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Netmarble Joybomb Inc. in December 2014. Netmarble Joybomb Inc. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6473.TWO.summary: SNSplus, Inc. operates as a social, Web, and mobile game publisher. The company also provides live streaming service; and content production/licensing services. It operates in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macao, Japan, Thailand, and the rest of Asia. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6482.TWO.summary: Fun Yours Technology Co.,Ltd. develops online and PC games. It provides role-playing, real-time strategy, action, and puzzle games. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

6561.TWO.summary: Chief Telecom Inc. provides telecommunication services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers POP sites; IDC services, including space/cage and suite, cabinet, inter-connection, customized power, and managed services; IDC value-added services, such as managed CPE, backup, and security services; and online IDC tour comprising L.Y. and T.F. building, cable, power, security, fire alarm, and air conditioning systems, as well as cold/hot aisle arrangement systems, lobbies, network operation centers, and IDC facilities. The company also provides enterprise networking solutions comprising multi-protocol label switching virtual private network, ADSL-VPN, tunnel VPN, SSL VPN application, data managed CPE; leased line, and international private leased circuit /IEPL; and Internet access solutions services. In addition, it offers ISR wholesale voice and voice over IP services; and retail voice services for businesses communications consisting of exchange equipment, circuit connection, and cost analysis data. Further, the company provides cloud services, such as cloud computing, APP cloud, data storage, security, and value-added services; and operates chief cloud exchange, Taipei internet exchange, and submarine exchange and voice exchange centers. Additionally, it offers global carrier, digital content, e-commerce, chain store, hybrid cloud, enterprise voice, data storage integration, greater china, and global communication solutions, as well as ICT integration solutions for traveling industry. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan. Chief Telecom Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd.

6583.TWO.summary: Jason's Entertainment Co., Ltd. produces television shows and dramas in Taiwan. The company also distributes and brokerages artists; and offers project marketing services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6595.TWO.summary: Julien's International Entertainment Group provides digital multimedia technology solutions worldwide. Its activities include theme park development and project management; digital content development, production, and distribution; floating theater and theme park equipment development; and investment in and development of Xingyu Cinema Park. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6596.TWO.summary: Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation engages in the promotion of art and cultural activities in Taiwan and internationally. It provides services in the areas of music, dance, exhibition, concert, drama, physical education, parenting, lecture, film, commodity, and package goods. The company was formerly known as Yucai International Marketing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation in July 2014. Kuang Hong Arts Management Incorporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6611.TWO.summary: Cayenne's Ark Mobile Co., Ltd. develops and sells mobile games. The company is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6622.TWO.summary: Bossdom Digiinnovation Co., Ltd. provides various content encoding services. It offers filming production, full feature post-production, VFX, animation, digital production, movie content aggregator, text localization, and digital color grading services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

6626.TWO.summary: GAME HOURS Inc. develops and publishes mobile/handheld gaming products. The company was formerly known as WeGames Corporation and changed its name to GAME HOURS Inc. in December 2020. GAME HOURS Inc. was founded in 2013 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

6650.TWO.long_name: Art Emperor Technology & Culture Co., Ltd
6650.TWO.summary: Art Emperor Technology & Culture Co., Ltd operates an art information website in Taiwan. Its website allows access art information; and offers art auction services, as well as TODAAY art, an e-commerce platform for artists. The company also offers art e-commerce and art advertising services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6688.TWO.summary: Deepjoy Picture Corporation engages in the film distribution, digital and TV copyright licensing, home video and audio distribution, and film investment businesses in Taiwan. It operates 100 DVD-owned cooperation channels; 92 movie theaters; and 5 cable TV channels, as well as OTT digital platforms. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

7551.TWO.summary: Flashaim Inc. provides digital marketing services to major portals and messaging software of Yahoo, Google, LINE, Facebook, and Bing and other advertising agencies. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

8450.TWO.summary: Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. produces and distributes dramatic puppetry series in Taiwan. It is also involved in the Pili satellite television station; production and distribution of DVD's and soundtrack; performance and movie activities; publications and posters, etc.; and licensing development of peripheral products. In addition, the company fan club and cosplay activity; operates puppetry community Website; manages allied counters and boutiques in Taiwan; and produces and distributes 3D animation. The company was formerly known as Da Chih Entertainment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. in August 2000. Pili International Multimedia Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

8487.TWO.summary: ELTA Technology Co.,Ltd. operates platform for digital content in Taiwan. The company has library of digital content and broadband-delivered AV materials. It offers IP/TV (STB or MOD), PC/TV, VOD, and mobile TV, as well as large-sized data transfer technology and wireless communications support services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

CHT.summary: Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd. provides telecommunication services in Taiwan. It operates through Domestic Fixed Communications Business, Mobile Communications Business, Internet Business, International Fixed Communications Business, and Others segments. The company offers local and domestic long distance telephone and leased line, broadband access, Wi-Fi, and multimedia on demand services; information and communication technology (ICT) services; and interconnection with its fixed-line network to other mobile and fixed-line operators. It also provides mobile; HiNet Internet, data communication, and cloud; application value-added and Internet data center; international long distance telephone, leased line, and data; and satellite services. In addition, the company distributes and sells mobile handsets, tablets, wearable devices, data cards, electronic materials, ICT products, and computing and business machinery equipment and software; designs, develops, produces, sells, and services semiconductor testing components, printed circuit boards, and electronic components and finished products, and automatic license plate recognition software and hardware products. Further, it offers property development and management; system, network, and communications integration; intelligent buildings and energy network; digital information supply and advertisement; property and liability insurance agency; family education; computing equipment installation; management consultancy; data processing; telecommunications engineering; Internet identify; and information and communication solution services. Additionally, the company engages in the investment; software design services, and internet contents production and play; motion picture production and distribution; and provision of energy saving solutions and international circuits, and services for electronic parts and machinery processed products. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

CHWD.F.summary: Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd. provides telecommunication services in Taiwan. It operates through Domestic Fixed Communications Business, Mobile Communications Business, Internet Business, International Fixed Communications Business, and Others segments. The company offers local and domestic long distance telephone and leased line, broadband access, Wi-Fi, and multimedia on demand services; information and communication technology (ICT) services; and interconnection with its fixed-line network to other mobile and fixed-line operators. It also provides mobile; HiNet Internet, data communication, and cloud; application value-added and Internet data center; international long distance telephone, leased line, and data; and satellite services. In addition, the company distributes and sells mobile handsets, tablets, wearable devices, data cards, electronic materials, ICT products, and computing and business machinery equipment and software; designs, develops, produces, sells, and services semiconductor testing components, printed circuit boards, and electronic components and finished products, and automatic license plate recognition software and hardware products. Further, it offers property development and management; system, network, and communications integration; intelligent buildings and energy network; digital information supply and advertisement; property and liability insurance agency; family education; computing equipment installation; management consultancy; data processing; telecommunications engineering; Internet identify; and information and communication solution services. Additionally, the company engages in the investment; software design services, and internet contents production and play; motion picture production and distribution; and provision of energy saving solutions and international circuits, and services for electronic parts and machinery processed products. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

GIFN.F.summary: GigaMedia Limited provides digital entertainment services in Taiwan and Hong Kong. The company operates FunTown, a digital entertainment portal that offers mobile and browser-based casual games through -branded platform. It offers MahJong, a traditional Chinese tile based game; casual card and table games; online card games; and chance-based games, including bingo, lotto, horse racing, Sic-Bo, slots, and various casual games. The company also provides sports games and role-playing games, such as Tales Runner, a multi-player online obstacle running game; Yume 100, a story -based game that targets female players; Akaseka, a female-oriented game; and Shinobi Master New Link, a male-oriented game. GigaMedia Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

GIGM.summary: GigaMedia Limited provides digital entertainment services in Taiwan and Hong Kong. The company operates FunTown, a digital entertainment portal that offers mobile and browser-based casual games through -branded platform. It offers MahJong, a traditional Chinese tile based game; casual card and table games; online card games; and chance-based games, including bingo, lotto, horse racing, Sic-Bo, slots, and various casual games. The company also provides sports games and role-playing games, such as Tales Runner, a multi-player online obstacle running game; Yume 100, a story -based game that targets female players; Akaseka, a female-oriented game; and Shinobi Master New Link, a male-oriented game. GigaMedia Limited was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

NDMT.long_name: NowNews Digital Media Technology Co. Ltd.
NDMT.summary: NowNews Digital Media Technology Co. Ltd. operates as a media company in Taiwan. It creates, collects, and distributes news and information through its Website, nownews.com; and applications on mobile phones or tablets. The company offers brand advertising services in display formats on its Website, as well as performance-based online marketing solutions, such as promoted feeds on mobile or tablet; and display advertising services comprising the text, images, and other interactive ads that run across the Web on computers and mobile devices. It also provides advertising campaign design and management services, including design and implementation of marketing and advertising projects consisting of content advertising through publishing topic news and experience articles, pop-up or embedded advertisements on its Website or applications, creation of visual/mobile/audio advertisement, etc. In addition, the company produces news articles/reports covering real-time news, such as politics, finance, life, technology, sport, entertainment, travel, and others, as well as licenses news content to portals and corporate partners. NowNews Digital Media Technology Co. Ltd. is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
